content:
Hello! I'm working on wasi-crypto. I've added P384 as a supported algorithm. I have two comments regarding wasi-crypto and Wasmtime:

  • I've added Cargo workspaces to wasi-crypto, but this breaks how wasmtime-wasi-crypto imports wasi-crypto, but this is easily fixed by using git = ... instead of path = ...
  • Also, I'm noticing that wasmtime-wasi-crypto and wasi-crypto both use the generated code from the Witx files. Why is that? Seems to me that wasmtime-wasi-crypto should just use that interface via wasi-crypto. This would really simplify things I think. Is this technically feasible, and if so, would it be welcomed as a PR?
